thread.title: Great hotel!
thread.title_full: Great hotel! - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LauraBowyer
title: Great hotel!
text:
Great stay!
Staff were amazing and so helpful and friendly. Even on their break/not on shift!
We were made very welcome.
Lovely room with everything we needed.
Great location with a subway stop just a block away (Port Authority) - Direct train to JFK (E train)
Walking distance to Times Square, Broadway and The Empire State Building.
Most other of the popular attractions are only a few stops away on the subway, you could walk to them if you felt like!
Would definitely recommend staying here and would happily stay here again myself!
